thread.title: 15 cities you've never heard of (but can fly to with Ryanair)
thread.title_full: 15 cities you've never heard of (but can fly to with Ryanair)

title: 15 cities you've never heard of (but can fly to with Ryanair)
text:
Ryanair's fleet of 372 aircraft flies to 192 destinations - so it's not surprising to discover a few headscratchers on its route map. Here are 15 lesser-known cities you might consider visiting this summer. 1. Ostrava, Czech Republic 
Get there from... Stansted 
The third largest city in the Czech Republic , this industrial hub is nicknamed "the steel heart" of the country. So far, so unappealing. The local tourist board says it is "an exciting city with its own unique and vibrant industrial heritage, where the former steelworks has been transformed into a cultural and educational quarter", but pollution, particularly from the nearby Arcelor Mittal plant, remains a problem. 
By Adrian Bridge and Oliver Smith GETTY
